pages.text: Made with mundane and simple magicks, these wands can perform simple and weak magical tasks. I can fashion a wand by creating a mundane wand base, and then combining it with some materials and runic magic within the runic table.
The Mundane Wand Base is the primary component for all mundane wands. One can be fashioned out of any wood log and some vis specks in the runic table.
Imbued with the magic of fire, this wand is capable of cooking raw foods that I'm holding. I can choose to cook all food I'm holding, or cook a single handful of food while doubling its yield.

$(l)Tier: $()$(2)Mundane$()$(br2)$(l)Primary Effect: $()Cooks all food in inventory.$(br2)$(l)Secondary Effect: $()Cooks a single stack of food, doubling the result.$(br2)$(l)Cost: $()144 $(item)Wand Powder

pages.text: Imbued with the magic of water and order, this wand is capable of freezing my foes, slowing them down. Casting this wand normally will freeze all nearby living beings, but I can also choose to ignore those I consider allies while casting.

$(l)Tier: $()$(2)Mundane$()$(br2)$(l)Primary Effect: $()Applies $(4)slowness $()to nearby entities for 10 seconds, and deals 2 damage.$(br2)$(l)Secondary Effect: $()Same as primary, but ignores players.$(br2)$(l)Cost: $()12 $(item)Wand Powder

pages.text: Imbued with the magic of life and energy, this wand is can fill the stomachs of self and others. I can choose to fill my own stomach, or those around me while casting.

$(l)Tier: $()$(2)Mundane$()$(br2)$(l)Primary Effect: $()Restores 4 shanks of hunger to self.$(br2)$(l)Secondary Effect: $()Restores 2 shanks of hunger to nearby entities.$(br2)$(l)Cost: $()8 $(item)Wand Powder

pages.text: Imbued with the magic of earth, this wand inflicts damage onto nearby beings. Casting the wand normally inflicts damage on everything near me, or I can choose to ignore allies.

$(l)Tier: $()$(2)Mundane$()$(br2)$(l)Primary Effect: $()Inflicts 3 damage to nearby entities.$(br2)$(l)Secondary Effect: $()Same as primary, but ignores players.$(br2)$(l)Cost: $()6 $(item)Wand Powder
